attributes.action: MPs Salary to be under £45,000 a year and no expenses
attributes.additional_details:
This epetition is to see cuts to MPs salerys and expenses.
While the hard working tax payers who struggle to pay bills are funding what, 23mil in expenses to MPs, they earn £67.060 a year so why is the tax payers money funding a lavish lifestyle for mps, it's the hard working public who struggle paying taxes while things like the nhs faces cuts, MPs should earn under £45,000 a year and have no entitlement to expenses, and the money should be put into what taxes are ment for are chrildrens schools are health care the police, or even lowering taxes.
So please take a second to sign this epetition to see are taxes go to good use not to fund the lavish lifestyle of others.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority not for government
